Name: Aftershock
Description: Spell. Deals 26...85...100 earth damage to nearby foes. Deals 10...56...68 more earth damage to knocked down foes.

Name: Air Attunement
Description: Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost whenever you use an Air Magic skill.

Name: Armor of Earth
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) You have +24...53...60 armor. You move 50...21...14% slower.

Name: Aura of Restoration
Description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...440...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

Name: Aura of Restoration (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...360...400% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

Name: Blinding Flash
Description: Spell. Inflicts Blindness condition (3...7...8 seconds).

Name: Blurred Vision
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (4...9...10 seconds). They have 50% chance to miss.

Name: Conjure Flame
Description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +5...17...20 fire damage. No effect unless your weapon deals fire damage.

Name: Conjure Frost
Description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +5...17...20 cold damage. No effect unless your weapon deals cold damage.

Name: Conjure Lightning
Description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +5...17...20 lightning damage. No effect unless your weapon deals lightning damage.

Name: Deep Freeze
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes in the area of your target (10 seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals 10...70...85 cold damage.

Name: Earth Attunement
Description: Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use an Earth Magic skill.

Name: Elemental Attunement
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (25...53...60 seconds.) Your elemental attributes are increased by +1...2...2. You gain 50% of the Energy cost of any Air
Activation: and Water Magic skills you use.

Name: Enervating Charge
Description: Spell. Deals 25...45...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration.

Name: Fire Attunement
Description: Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Fire Magic skill.

Name: Fire Storm
Description: Spell. Deals 5...29...35 fire damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

Name: Fireball
Description: Spell. Projectile: deals 7...91...112 fire damage to target and adjacent foes.

Name: Flare
Description: Spell. Projectile: deals 20...56...65 fire damage. If Overcast

Name: Gale
Description: Spell. Causes knock-down. 50% failure chance unless Air Magic 5 or more.

Name: Glyph of Elemental Power
Description: Glyph. (25 seconds.) Boosts your elemental attributes by +2 for your next 10 spells.

Name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
Description: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells cost 10...16...18 less Energy.

Name: Ice Spear
Description: Enchantment Spell. Projectile: deals 10...50...60 cold damage. Gain +1...3...4 Health regeneration for 5 seconds if Overcast.

Name: Ice Spikes
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (2...5...6 seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals 20...68...80 cold damage.

Name: Immolate
Description: Spell. Deals 20...64...75 fire damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]).

Name: Inferno
Description: Spell. Deals 30...114...135 fire damage to foes adjacent to you.

Name: Lightning Orb
Description: Spell. Projectile: deals 10...82...100 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

Name: Lightning Strike
Description: Hex Spell. Deals 5...41...50 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Hex for 3 seconds if Overcast. End effect: deals 5...41...50 lightning damage.

Name: Lightning Surge
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) End effect: deals 14...83...100 lightning damage
Energy: and inflicts Cracked Armor (5...17...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration.

Name: Lightning Touch
Description: Touch Skill. Deals 10...50...60 lightning damage. Also hits foes adjacent to target foe. Inflicts Blind (1...3...4 second[s]) and Cracked Armor (1...8...10 second[s]) on all struck foes. 25% armor penetration.

Name: Maelstrom
Description: Spell. Deals 10...22...25 cold damage and interrupts spells each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

Name: Meteor
Description: Spell. Deals 7...91...112 fire damage and causes knock-down. Also hits foes adjacent to target foe.

Name: Mind Burn
Description: Elite Spell. Deals 15...51...60 fire damage. If you have more energy than target foe
Overcast: deals 15...51...60 more fire damage and inflicts Burning (1...8...10 second[s]). Also hits adjacent foes.

Name: Mind Freeze
Description: Elite Hex Spell. Deals 10...50...60 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe
Overcast: deals +10...50...60 cold damage and causes 90% slower movement (1...4...5 second[s]).

Name: Mind Freeze (PvP)
Description: Elite Hex Spell. Deals 10...34...40 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe
Overcast: deals +10...34...40 cold damage and causes 90% slower movement (1...4...5 second[s]).

Name: Obsidian Flame
Description: Spell. Deals 22...94...112 damage.

Name: Obsidian Flame (PvP)
Description: Spell. Deals 22...78...92 damage.

Name: Obsidian Flesh
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) You have +20 armor and enemy spells cannot target you. You cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.

Name: Over the Limit
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Spells cast 15...19...20% faster and recharge 15...43...50% faster. Continuously gain Overcast while active. PvE Skill

Name: Rust
Description: Hex Spell. Deals 10...58...70 cold damage to target and adjacent foes. Hexes target and adjacent foes (5...17...20 seconds). Doubles signet activation time. Interrupts and disables signets for 1...8...10 second[s] if you are Overcast.

Name: Stone Daggers
Description: Spell. Two projectiles: each deals 8...28...33 earth damage. If Overcast

Name: Stoning
Description: Spell. Projectile: deals 45...93...105 earth damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is Weakened.

Name: Ward Against Foes
Description: Ward Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Foes in this ward move 50% slower.

Name: Ward Against Melee
Description: Ward Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward have a 50% chance to block melee attacks. Allied spirits are not affected.

Name: Water Attunement
Description: Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Water Magic skill.
